Text:
1080i is stunning. The difference is night and day compared to 1080p. I watch Game of Thrones and the 1080i files are jaw dropping and the 1080p are throwaways. 
Thanks for this Nepotu. A legend you are, as always.  :)

@Maunopieru: Yes, you have right. In fact FullHD means that an AV equipment can display all available HD resolutions up to 1080p (is logical, no?)
@MikeyMetal: Always a pleasure. You are welcome, my friend!
lol if only i could download 32gb in a day xD
